Entities.Name: Lids and Lashes (L/L)
Entities.Definition: Ophthalmic examination component focused on the external eyelid structures and eyelashes.

Entities.Name: Conjunctiva and Sclera (C/S)
Entities.Definition: Assessment of the conjunctival and scleral tissue for signs of inflammation, injection, or other pathology.

Entities.Name: Cornea (K)
Entities.Definition: Examination of the corneal surface for clarity, defects, or scarring.

Entities.Name: Anterior Chamber (AC)
Entities.Definition: Assessment of the anterior chamber depth and presence of cells or flare.

Entities.Name: Iris
Entities.Definition: Examination of the iris for normal architecture or abnormal findings like synechiae or rubeosis.

Entities.Name: Lens
Entities.Definition: Assessment of lens clarity, position, and presence of cataract or intraocular lens.
SampleData: posterior chamber intraocular lens in place

Entities.Name: Anterior Vitreous (AV)
Entities.Definition: Assessment of the anterior vitreous for cells, haze, or hemorrhage.

Entities.Name: Optic Disc
Entities.Definition: Fundus exam component involving assessment of the optic nerve head.

Entities.Name: Cup to Disc Ratio (CDR)
Entities.Definition: Measurement comparing the diameter of the optic cup to the optic disc.

Entities.Name: Macula (M)
Entities.Definition: Evaluation of the central retina responsible for fine visual acuity.

Entities.Name: Vessels (V)
Entities.Definition: Assessment of the retinal blood vessels for tortuosity, attenuation, or leakage.

Entities.Name: Periphery (P)
Entities.Definition: Examination of the peripheral retina for tears, detachments, or pigment changes.

Dataset.Name: Stanford Ophthalmology Progress Notes Corpus
Dataset.Description: 39,099 ophthalmology notes weakly labeled using SmartForms to extract 24 distinct ophthalmic examination components (12 per eye). Evaluated using both weak and human-labeled sets.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Entity labels were derived using a weak supervision approach matching SmartForm values to progress notes. Labels were assigned in IOB2 format (B-label, I-label, O) using greedy alignment of known token-value pairs. Evaluation used Prodigy for correction and review.
